summary: The Mystic Gloves are based on the Focusing/Mystic Tuning Gloves. Original design and 3 recolors included. All gloves are enchantable. You can buy the gloves from Drevis Neloren at the College of Winterhold.
descriptionHtml:
Japanese Translation Patch by aohige: [url=http://www.4shared.com/archive/ITmshgNr/Mystic_Gloves_v14_.html]http://www.4shared.com/archive/ITmshgNr/Mystic_Gloves_v14_.html[/url]


[size=4][color=lightblue]Mystic Gloves v1.4 (by Volek)[/color][/size]

The Mystic Gloves are based on the Focusing/Mystic Tuning Gloves. Original design and 3 recolors included. All gloves are enchantable and compatible with the Mage Armor perk
You can buy the gloves from Drevis Neloren at the College of Winterhold, he\'s usually walking around the college exteriors or inside the Hall of Countenance.

When you wear the gloves, you may notice some clipping with certain clothes/armor/robes, install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8826]Better fitting gloves by Feather Grey[/url] to fix it. Download and install the optional file, and overwrite the meshes.

Installation:
Extract the Data folder from the zip file to your Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\Skyrim\\ folder
If you want to install Feather Grey\'s fix, do it AFTER installing this mod.

Version History:
1.4 - fixed more Mage Armor perk issues, more gloves for sale
1.3 - fixed Mage Armor perk issues (not all though)
1.2 - added gloves to Drevis Neloren\'s merchant inventory, removed chest
1.1 - fixed Archmage Quarters cell name
1.0 - initial release (gloves are in a chest in the Archmage Quarters)

No permission needed to use this in other mods, just give credit.
author: Volek
